topic.title: [Discussion] World's Going to Shit
topic.body:
Welcome 0net, where we discuss all kinds of ways the world's going to hell and shit

None of this pls:

"orange man bad"

"It's the Jews"

or

"That was never real communism"

or

"That was never real fascism"
  
or

"Old man biden bad"


Enjoy the topic guys

1615519854_114GEWEupBzXfggqZEZCXcpYw9Cdg.body:
> [lordfirefox](#comment_13_1Ec11mGe5joBoboUH2s2idKHp1YVbzaepq): I lost all of mine in a boating accident in the Atlantic. Lost the boat too.

Ah yes, me too, a lot of boating accidents this time of year

1617373305_1HTbdyz4zToxkxfmuYYfNVN1Y3U2y.body:
> [unsnapgreedless](#comment_16_19XzssAaDbJ1rbCNCYxDioen1gxGxqiNyh): The capitol hill "assault" was committed by known BLM and Antifa thugs. It started before Trump had even finished his speech. He had nothing to do with it. [...]

Why does everyone on the decentralized net or any privacy respecting protocol always either a socialist or an "orange man bad" repeating NPC

1616953116_15cApprVFcr1skAkWssq5aAXKa7pD.body:
> [boot13](#comment_22_1PxMvud9KvbqaSZnV4piygA6dFTASwapHY): Stallman is a toxic asshole and the FSF board should all be removed for bringing him back.

"he ableist, transphobic, homophobic, and RMS bad" stfu and go back to twitter with Poettering
